question: After killing Kaimurs, which of the following established the Khilji Dynasty?
explanation: In 1290 CE, Firoz who was the Ariz-i-Mumalik during the reign of Kaimur andÂ who later took the title of Jalaluddin Khalji took a bold step by murdering Kaimurs and seized the throne. A group of Khalji nobles led by him established the Khalji dynasty.
